emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of unknown man, Marion Bond Jordon, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Rev. Charles Foggie at podium, on stage at Soldier's and Sailor's Memorial Hall for NAACP protest rally
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, pg. A8 reads: "NAACP Protest Rally: 3,000 Hear Emmett Till Case Facts; Give; Urge United States to Act - Announcing Donations - The Rev. Charles H. Foggie, Pittsburgh NAACP president (right), is assisted by NAACP executive secretary Marion B. Jordon and vice president Leroy Patrick in announcing donations."
